fields.name: *You don't know exactly what 1507:
fields.value:
Crystalist does? Do you even play this game?*
Attack: Unstoppable
Defense: Basic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose two players to quiz on Grand Idea Mafia roles each day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the next night, both players will be locked out of all channels in the GIM server except a new private one for each of them.
- Then, they will each receive the names of the same five roles from the GIM roles thread that neither of them made, chosen at random.
- Whichever player can better describe the general functions of more of the roles in the host's opinion wins; the other is dealt an Unstoppable attack.
- If it's a tie, both die, unless they both get all 5 correct, in which case neither does.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill three players with your quizzes.
